OrgName.entry: ROUNDABOUT LTD - SUPPORT AND ACCOMMODATION FOR HOMELESS YOUNG PEOPLE

Desc.entry: Provides accommodation and support for homeless young people aged 16-25 years in emergency and medium term move-on accommodation. Self-referral possible. Offers advice and support, life skills, literacy training and other activities. User participation is encouraged. Young people gaining permanent accommodation can also receive ongoing resettlement support to help them retain their tenancies. Emergency accommodation available. Also supports young people living in their own tenancies, for details contact Stencil, (see separate entry). Company limited by guarantee no 3313253.

Pubs.entry: Annual Report; Information pack; General leaflet

category.entry: HOUSING, ADVICE AND SUPPORT FOR HOMELESS OR VULNERABLE PEOPLE
